channel.title: Make item for owner only
channel.description: how do you make it so an item/weapon is only usuable/weildable by owner or player with rights of 3 so they cant pick it up and also how do you chnage the bonus eg. i want a weapon that only owner could use that has really high bonus so it can be used to control people when pking if they team or mass they can get 1hit.

[/quote]

item.title: Make item for owner only
item.dc:creator: @ub3r_1337_h4x0r_n00b ub3r 1337 h4x0r n00b
item.description:
@ub3r_1337_h4x0r_n00b wrote:

hey i guess u can make an obscure item untradable such as a ring of visibility [4657] or a ring of charos(u) [6456] or something else that someone would have no excuse to wanting one inocently, something that they wouldnt come accross by accident…
so then u get loads of these in ur bank so u have a suply of it, but the examples above are quest items so u cant note them so if u wanna have lots id say choose a dueling ring of a random charge.
ring of dueling(4) - 2560
noted ring of dueling(4) - 2561
then you dont tell anyone that you are using a dueling ring, and they wont get it if u die cos its untradable. so only you know about it so only u know about it…
